full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* **Title (English)**: BPM018904 - JIRA License Subscription, Maintenance and Support for the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat
* **Title (French)**: BPM018904 - Souscription, maintenance et support de la licence JIRA pour le Secrétariat du Conseil du Trésor du Canada

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022848:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018904/22848
* **Publication Date**: June 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 19, 2023, at 14:00 HNE
* **Amendment Date**: June 15, 2023

## Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0C3, Canada
* **End User**: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat

## Goods and Services

* **Goods/Services Description**: JIRA License Subscription, Maintenance and Support
* **Delivery Province/Region**: Ontario (except NCR), National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Duration**: From June 28, 2023, to June 27, 2024 (inclusive)

## Required Conditions

* **Evaluation Criteria**: Responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price
* **Submission Requirements**: Electronic submission only, as per Contracting Authority’s email
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Agnes Kowalska
* **Email**: [agnez.kowalska2@ssc-tspc.gc.ca](mailto:agnez.kowalska2@ssc-tspc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 343-551-9034

## Additional Information

* **Bid Submission Requirements**: Please refer to the Request for Quotations document for the complete details regarding this requirement.
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
